name: SnakeLaw Island (Brainchild)
description:
SnakeLaw Island is the first game from BAFTA Young Game Designer finalist David McIntosh.

Enter a world of bizarrely eccentric characters, laugh-out-loud dialogue and devious platforming, as unlikely hero Twig Duckington embarks on an adventure through Snakelaw Island, a world locked in eternal conflict between the Dawner and Dusker armies.

  • BAFTA Young Game Designer finalist game
  • Comedic single-player adventure, featuring a cast of eccentric characters
  • Hardcore precision-platforming over a collection of worlds
  • Unpredictable boss fights span genres from bullet hell to rhythm game
  • A soundtrack that begs to be whistled!
